channel.title: CVE Feed for Optimole -- Super Page Cache for Cloudflare
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Optimole -- Super Page Cache for Cloudflare

item.title: CVE-2024-27968|2024-08-02T00:41:55.957Z -- optimole -- super%20page%20cache%20for%20cloudflare
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Optimole Super Page Cache for Cloudflare allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Super Page Cache for Cloudflare: from n/a through 4.7.5.
